name: Noctica
description:
Noctica is a Dynamic / Procedural exploratory world.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xCcPEunuKfg

Noctica is a play on the word Noctilucales, bioluminescent ocean dwelling organisms, and defines the aesthetic of the whole experience. This project is exploring the magic that Oculus and Leap are providing in a bioluminescent world full of magic, beauty, and creation. The goal is to create a synesthetic experience combining music, sound, art, and interaction in a way which is sublimely beautiful.
